page.title: 08Gulliver's Kingdom - M.Bath
page.content: {Gulliver's Kingdom}covers 14.7 acres. It was named after Jonathan Swift's book.It opened in 1978.There are about 65 rides and attractions.Many safety precautions are taken and regular checks are carried out.There are several eating places for tourists.Gulliver's Kingdom is specially designed for under 11 year olds.In the summer 68 people are employed here and 16 in the winter. {The Royal Cave}is near to Gulliver's Kingdom.At the entrance you see a film Inside the cave are a series of tableaux telling the story of the cave from prehistoric times into the future These have computer controlled illum- inations and sound commentaries.It is one of the first caves in the U.K. to have this type of computer controlled tableaux.
